meanings.definition: The state of being obsolete or outdated.
meanings.sent1: The obsolescence of VHS tapes led to the rise of DVDs.
meanings.sent2: Technology companies constantly strive to avoid obsolescence in their products.
meanings.sent3: The obsolescence of flip phones made them collector's items.
meanings.sent4: In the fast-paced tech world, obsolescence can happen overnight.
meanings.sent5: The obsolescence of typewriters is a clear sign of progress.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming obsolete or outdated.
meanings.sent1: Obsolescence in fashion trends can be seen every season.
meanings.sent2: The obsolescence of old software versions is inevitable.
meanings.sent3: The obsolescence of pagers seems almost comical now.
meanings.sent4: The obsolescence of traditions can sometimes be refreshing.
meanings.sent5: Obsolescence in technology drives innovation forward.
